attributes.action: Protect The Children Not The Criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have become more and more appalled by the use of hard working taxpayers 
money and the unbelievable laws that are passed now a days.
The laws of this country do nothing but tie the hands of the police, put the 
victims in even more of a vulnerable state and protect the criminals. Stop 
worrying about criminals’ rights and start thinking about the law abiding 
people of this country. Criminals shouldn't have human rights, the day they 
decided to act against their fellow man they give up their human rights.
Let’s stop using taxes to look after prisoners and start using it to protect 
the innocent; I am especially thinking of the children. More needs to be 
done to protect the children and more needs to be done to stop child sex 
slave trades. 
It's time to stop looking the other way and start protecting the children, 
not the criminals.

rejection.details: Please give an explicit action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
